items.title: Travelers Announces the Start of the 2025 Travelers Championship
items.description: HARTFORD, Conn., June 16, 2025--The Travelers Companies, Inc. (NYSE: TRV) today announced the start of the 2025 Travelers Championship at TPC River Highlands in Cromwell, Connecticut, the final Signature Event of the PGA TOUR season. This year’s tournament marks Travelers’ 19th consecutive year as title sponsor, making the company the longest-running title sponsor in the event’s history.
